coded_answer.p: I am writing inwith reference to the programme for the English class, that is going to spend three days in London. I have already read the programme, and I agree withlike thatit, I think that the class will like going to Sightseeingsightseeing by bus and in the afternoon going toon the Riverriver trip to Greenwich,. Also, they can visit the Science Museum, and they can goinggo to the shopping, on. On Wednesday 15 March they are going to visit Thethe National Art Gallery, really, I think that is a good programme.

However, I think as well, that the class would like to visit "The London Fashion and Leisure Show"that the class would like to visit "The London Fashion and Leisure Show" as well, it is on Tuesday from 10.00 AMam until 19.00 pm. They don't need to pay.

In addition, I think it is a good a idea, because they could go afterafterwards shoppingshopping afterwards, when they have asome free time,. I am sure about that, they will likewant to visit that place. However, theThe programme could be changed just for a few hours, it is a great opportunity for everybody.
Finally, I hope that you understand my personal opinion about the programme, I will understand and accept youyour personal opinion as well.
I look forward to hearing from you.
My personal opinion about famous people, is that their lives are good in one way and bad in another way.
I think that they live their life like hatthat, because they want to live this life.

They doingdo everything just for money, and sometimes, they can make theirstheir life easier than theyit would normally dobe. It is true, they deserve to have a private life without journalistjournalists following them all the time, however this newspublicity givegivesbrings them money, and a confortablecomfortable life.
Famous people, such as politicians and film stars, they live happyhappily, because they know that thebeing famous meanmeans to bebeing rich.

They can travel around the world, buy everything, it is a good life, but at the same time, they must be a very good peaplepeople, because "the FamousFame" is just for a fewshort time, nothing islasts forever in this world.
My personal opinion is that, I think they aren't really happy, and they are selfish as well.
I dowould not really like will beto be a famous person, because you are not really yourselfhyourself, and for me that is the moremost important thing.
